name: GMail - 2 Remove lines from the main menu
description:
This style allows you to remove the lines you don't need in the main menu.
By default, the third line is removed (Chats), but you may customize the behaviour of the style.
Just edit the style and comment/uncomment the rules according to the explanations.

You may have a look at the code before installing it in order to understand well what you will have to do.
